package ruletemplate.simple; import uk.gov.iebr.batch.model.input.Person ;
rule "Categorize Persons_2" no-loop true when $c: Person(harmScore >= 100, harmScore <= 1000, harmCategory == Person.HarmCategory.NA) then modify ($c){ setHarmCategory(Person.HarmCategory.HIGH)}; end
rule "Categorize Persons_1" no-loop true when $c: Person(harmScore >= 20, harmScore <= 99, harmCategory == Person.HarmCategory.NA) then modify ($c){ setHarmCategory(Person.HarmCategory.MEDIUM)}; end
rule "Categorize Persons_0" no-loop true when $c: Person(harmScore >= 0, harmScore <= 19, harmCategory == Person.HarmCategory.NA) then modify ($c){ setHarmCategory(Person.HarmCategory.LOW)}; end
